dcterms:creator: CMU
dcterms:description: The Human motion capture dataset from the CMU graphics laboratory, captured by Vicon infra-red system, includes movement data of subject 86, which is a combination of 9 different types of human movements such as 'walking', 'running', 'clapping', etc.
dcterms:title: CMU Motion Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. H. Ko
G. W. West
S. Venkatesh
M. Kumar
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 180 samples of data from 12 different classes of umpire signals related to the cricket game.
dcterms:title: Cricket Umpire’s Signals

dcterms:creator: Jun Wang
Ashok Samal
Jordan Green
dcterms:description: The articulatory words dataset consists of facial movement signals captured via EMA sensors, used to categorize 25 classes of different words uttered by the subjects.
dcterms:title: Articulatory Words

dcterms:creator: Thomas Waltemate
Felix Hülsmann
Thies Pfeiffer
Stefan Kopp
Mario Botsch
dcterms:description: The squat dataset consists of a set of squat movements performed by three coaches, captured by an optical MOCAP system, segmented into three movement primitives: 'preparation', 'going down', and 'coming up'.
dcterms:title: Squat Dataset
